title: Digital Designer
job_overview:
About the Role

Star Digital Marketing needs a Digital Designer. Working front (client-focused), you'll liaise directly with the client alongside the account management team.

You'll need to be prepared for a fast-paced environment. We are NOT looking for a freelancer; we are looking for a Full-Time Team member!

You'll need to be passionate about all things digital and desire to learn and develop your skills. This role has genuine growth opportunities and a great platform. It is a unique opportunity to showcase your design skills in our growing digital design consultancy, which has over 25 years of experience in the design/web industries.  

Under the wing of our Creative / UX director, the role will require you to showcase your design and knowledge in:

Website Design & Builder Development

Social Media Ad Campaigns

Web App Design / UX/UI

SEM & SEO

Traditional Print Design (a bonus)

We're looking for a talented designer who;

Has a love of design, tech and innovation

Is motivated and keen to learn

Lateral thinker

Work will involve direct (video) conferencing for briefing, workshopping and work review.  With remote working on projects at home.

Software Skills required (based on importance)

Figma 

Wordpress, DIVI Builder & CSS

Adobe Creative Suite


Facebook Business

Animate

Work includes new corporate website design/build, existing site transformation and modernisation, some social ad creation, researching web solutions, maintaining/upgrading/development on managed sites and moreâ€¦.
